title: Under the Influence_ A Jam Band Tribute nyrd Skynyrd (2004)
description:
This Sanctuary label cash-in comp features a host of the current crop of "jam bands," including Blues Tra-
veler, Les Claypool, Galactic, Big Head Todd, Gov't Mule, Yonder Mountain String Band, and moe. (feat. John 
Hiatt on vocals) playing Lynyrd Skynyrd covers. ~ Thom Jurek

Track Listing:
==================================================================================================================
Ronnie Van Zant = RVZ, Gary Rossington = GR, Allen Collins = AC, Ed King = EK, Billy Powell = BP, 
Jeff Carlisi = JC

1.  Les Claypool                  Call Me The Breeze	         03:50 (J.J. Cale)   [Second Helping, 1974]
2.  Galactic                      Saturday Night Special         03:59 (EK, RVZ)     [Nuthin' Fancy, 1975]
3.  Gov't Mule                    Simple Man	 	         07:56 (GR, RVZ)     [Lynyrd Skynyrd, 1973]
4.  North Mississippi Allstars    Whiskey Rock-A-Roller          04:34 (EK, RVZ, BP) [Nuthin' Fancy, 1975]
5.  moe. feat. John Hiatt         The Ballad Of Curtis Loew      04:53 (AC, RVZ)     [Second Helping, 1974]
6.  Blues Traveler                Free Bird	 	         05:38 (AC, RVZ)     [Lynyrd Skynyrd, 1973]
7.  Drive-By Truckers             Every Mother's Son	         03:37 (GR, RVZ)     [Gimme Back My Bullets, 1976]
8.  Big Head Todd & The Monsters  Sweet Home Alabama	         03:37 (EK, GR, RVZ) [Second Helping, 1974]
9.  The Disco Biscuits            Gimme Three Steps	         03:34 (AC, RVZ)     [Lynyrd Skynyrd, 1973]
10. Yonder Mountain String Band   Four Walls Of Raiford          04:05 (JC, RVZ)     [Legend, 1987]
11. Particle                      Workin' For MCA [Instrumental] 07:12 (EK, RVZ)     [Second Helping, 1974]
==================================================================================================================
